generic.check_connection: Check your internet connection and try again later.

update_required.description: You have to download newest application version before you can use it.

permissions.camera_description_ios: App does not have access to phone's camera. To activate it, please go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Camera and set switch on next to application.
permissions.camera_description_android: App does not have access to phone's camera. To activate, hold your finger on app's icon and select "About" option, then Permissions > Camera.
permissions.gallery_description_ios: App does not have access to Photos. To activate it, please go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Photos and set switch on next to application.
permissions.gallery_description_android: App does not have access to phone's gallery. To activate, hold your finger on app's icon and select "About" option, then Permissions > Photos and movies.

user_profile.cant_save: There was an error while we were trying to save your profile. Try again after a while, and if the problem recurs, please contact us.
user_profile.saved_but_without_pfp: Your profile was saved correctly, but unfortunately we weren't able to save your profile picture. Try again after a while, and if the problem recurs, please contact us.

external_sign_up.base_description: We weren't able to log you in using {provider}. Try again after a while, and if the problem recurs, please contact us
